Description: The LTD MH-103 QM gorgeous electric guitar from ESP features a bolt-on 3-piece maple neck, basswood body with gorgeous blue quilted maple top, and a maple fretboard. The thin U-shaped neck with 24 extra jumbo frets provides comfort and speed. An ESP humbucker and 2 single-coil pickup configuration provides lots of tone versatility. ESP tuners keep you tuned so you'll sound your best. Volume, tone and a 5-way toggle give you options with simplicity. Tremolo bridge lets you dive bomb the night away. Black nickel hardware finishes off a great look. This Beautiful used LTD MH-103QM is in excellent shape, I would rate it a nine OR ten but I'm sure there is some small mark on it that I'm not seeing. She plays great, low action, all electronics work properly. Fret board and frets are in outstanding shape. It will be shipped in a soft sided gig bag with much TLC. The buy it now price will include a guitar strap and set of Ernie Ball slinky strings. Pay pal only and shipping to the lower USA 48. Features · Bolt-On · 25.5" Scale · Basswood Body · Quilted Maple Top · Maple Neck · Maple Fingerboard · Locking Nut · 42mm Neck Width · Thin U Neck Contour · 24 XJ Frets · Black Nickel Hardware · ESP Tuners · Floyd Rose Special Bridge · ESP LH-150 (B) / LS-120 (N&M) pickups
Title: BEAUTIFUL BLUE ESP LTD 103QM GUITAR , EXCELLENT SHAPE, GREAT PLAYER
